# acceptsGlyphInfo

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver accepts the glyph info attribute.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var acceptsGlyphInfo: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the receiver accepts the `NSGlyphInfoAttributeName` attribute from text input sources such as input methods and the pasteboard, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] otherwise.
